name: Borka Sflork Space Port
description:
Use your VR headset to work in the galaxy's third-largest spaceport... Borka Sflork! For maximum efficiency, travelers are frozen and diced before traveling with us. Reassemble the passengers while respecting their privacy. Don't peek into their insides, and remember to wash your hands or tentacles

Made at global game jam 2020 in 48 hours.

All 3D assets were drawn in Quill.
